content: That's really helpful, thanks! I think I'll try to find aji amarillo peppers online, but if I can't, I'll substitute with banana peppers. For the Korean-Style Fried Chicken, I'll make sure to use a combination of cornstarch, panko breadcrumbs, and potato starch for the crispiest coating. Can you give me some advice on how to store leftover fried chicken? I've had trouble keeping it crispy when reheating.
